sentences.sContent: Because the cave fish may not need less sleep—they may need to stay awake to forage more in an environment where food can be scarce and appear unpredictably.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because the cave fish may not need less sleep—they may need to stay awake to forage more in an environment where food can be scarce and appear unpredictably.
sentences.sCn: 因为穴居鱼可能并不需要睡得更少——它们可能需要保持清醒，以便更经常地在食物短缺和食物不常出现的环境中觅食。

words.tran: 不可预知的；不定的；出乎意料的
不可预测性，不可预知性；不可预见性

trans.tranCn: 不可预见地,  不能预料地
